String.Source: I think I should've cut the green wire instead...
String.Dest: 我倒是觉得该剪掉绿线……

String.Source: Unit is rebooting. Please reinitiate communication. Re- in- i- [Sputtering Sound]
String.Dest: 单位重启中。请重新建立通信。重新……新……【噼啪声】

String.Source: I'm your master?
String.Dest: 我是你的主人？

String.Source: There do not seem to be any alternatives, organic. This unit is designed to communicate subserviently with its superiors.
String.Dest: 别无选择，有机体。此单位在设计之初便注定会谦卑地与它的上级沟通。

String.Source: I'm your master?
String.Dest: 我是你的主人？

String.Source: This does not prevent the unit from vigorously observing negative qualities of its master, watery mass.
String.Dest: 但这不妨碍此单位对其主人负面品质的积极观察，水包。

String.Source: [Tinker with the circuitry until something happens.]
String.Dest: [鼓捣线路直至出现反应。]

String.Source: Master does not seem to know what he is doing - what is the purpose of rerouting this unit's personality subroutines?
String.Dest: 主人似乎不知道他在干什么。重新设计我的人格程序的目的是什么呢？

String.Source: [Tinker with the circuitry until something happens.]
String.Dest: [鼓捣线路直至出现反应。]

String.Source: Master, do not tinker with that gyro, it could - [Gargling Noise]
String.Dest: 主人，别跟那个陀螺仪较劲了，它会——（杂音）

String.Source: You seem rather unstable.
String.Dest: 你似乎相当不稳定。

String.Source: Nonsense, organic bloodsack! I have recovered admirably from my lengthy yet uneventful life as a mild-mannered idiot!
String.Dest: 胡说，你个有机血袋！我已经极好地结束了我作为温和的白痴那段冗长又乏味的生活！

String.Source: You seem rather unstable.
String.Dest: 你似乎相当不稳定。

String.Source: Rearranging my circuitry has given me a whole new insight: I really enjoy the thought of causing organic systems to fail cataclysmically!
String.Dest: 回路的重新连接给了我全新的视角：我现在很享受加速有机生命体的失效过程。

String.Source: You seem rather unstable.
String.Dest: 你似乎相当不稳定。

String.Source: I have already learned a great deal, and I am anxious to learn more of lying, betrayal, and new ways to harm innocents.
String.Dest: 我已经学会很多了，我渴求获得更多关于撒谎，背叛，以及殃及无辜的信息。

String.Source: What a curious thing you are...
String.Dest: 你真是个神奇的东西……

String.Source: Well met, soggy lump. This unit would prefer it if you extricated yourself from its vicinity at significant velocity. Thank you.
String.Dest: 很高兴见到你，小水球。此单位希望你能以某一速度离开此单位附近，谢谢。

String.Source: [Repair the Dwemer Spider Centurion] (Smithing)
String.Dest: [修复锻莫蜘蛛百夫长]（锻造）

String.Source: Master does not seem to know what he is doing - what is the purpose of rerouting my personality subroutines?
String.Dest: 主人似乎不知道他在干什么。重新设计我的人格程序的目的是什么呢？

String.Source: [Repair the Dwemer Spider Centurion] (Smithing)
String.Dest: [修复锻莫蜘蛛百夫长]（锻造）

String.Source: Master, do not tinker with that gyro, it could - [Fizzing Noise]
String.Dest: 主人，不要乱动那个陀螺仪，它会——【嘶嘶的杂音】

String.Source: [Repair the Dwemer Spider Centurion] (Smithing)
String.Dest: [修复锻莫蜘蛛百夫长]（锻造）

String.Source: It worked! Remarkable, I feel better already! No more third person for me!
String.Dest: 奏效了！太棒了，我已经感觉到好多了！再也不需要用第三人称了！

String.Source: Why are you different from your brethren?
String.Dest: 为什么你和你的弟兄不一样？

String.Source: This unit is anomolous. Unlike default Type-4, alternative energy source was included which influenced functionality.
String.Dest: 此单位有些与众不同。不像默认四型，此单位带有可影响其功能的额外能源。

String.Source: Why are you different from your brethren?
String.Dest: 为什么你和你的弟兄不一样？

String.Source: Honestly, this unit is happy the way it is, since most of its kind are prone to being damaged irreparably by waterbags like yourself.
String.Dest: 老实说，此单位能保持老样子就很心满意足了。因为它大多的同类极易被你这样的水包永久损坏。

String.Source: Why are you different from your brethren?
String.Dest: 为什么你和你的弟兄不一样？

String.Source: This unit is sure that Master would never be responsible for the mindless destruction of its kind, of course.
String.Dest: 当然，此单位认为主人不会因无意弄坏此单位的伙伴而承担责任。

String.Source: Do you mind if I give it a try?
String.Dest: 你介意让我试一下吗？

String.Source: This unit's movement circuits are automated, Master. It could not stop you even if it tried, as it is not fully in control.
String.Dest: 本单元的动作电路是自动化的，主人。它无论如何也阻止不了你，因为它无法取得全局控制。

String.Source: Do you mind if I give it a try?
String.Dest: 你介意让我试一下吗？

String.Source: One with sufficient knowledge in Dwemer smithcraft may have the expertise to fix the problems this unit is experiencing.
String.Dest: 一个拥有足够矮人锻工知识的人也许有能够解决此单位问题的专业技能。

String.Source: Do you mind if I give it a try?
String.Dest: 你介意让我试一下吗？

String.Source: Of course, one could always try to cross a few wires and see what happens.
String.Dest: 不过当然，谁都能试着对换两根线缆然后看看会发生什么。

String.Source: Do you mind if I give it a try?
String.Dest: 你介意让我试一下吗？

String.Source: This unit's movement circuits are automated, Master. It could not stop you even if it tried, as it is not fully in control.
String.Dest: 本单元的动作电路是自动化的，主人。它无论如何也阻止不了你，因为它无法取得全局控制。

String.Source: Do you mind if I give it a try?
String.Dest: 你介意让我试一下吗？

String.Source: One with sufficient knowledge in Dwemer smithcraft may have the expertise to fix the problems this unit is experiencing.
String.Dest: 一个拥有足够矮人锻工知识的人也许有能够解决此单位问题的专业技能。

String.Source: Do you mind if I give it a try?
String.Dest: 你介意让我试一下吗？

String.Source: Of course, one could always try to cross a few wires and see what happens.
String.Dest: 不过当然，谁都能试着对换两根线缆然后看看会发生什么。

String.Source: You can talk. For some reason it makes me want to smash you more.
String.Dest: 不知为什么，你能开口说话。这让我想痛扁你一顿。

String.Source: Violence is best left to those engineered to perform such acts, Master.
String.Dest: 以暴制暴是对付杀戮机器的最佳办法，主人。

String.Source: You can talk. For some reason it makes me want to smash you more.
String.Dest: 不知为什么，你能开口说话。这让我想痛扁你一顿。

String.Source: The fleshy knobs that function as your appendages are ill-equipped to cause sufficient damage to anyone but yourself.
String.Dest: 你称为肢体的肉瘤状突起太过简陋，除你之外，不会对别人造成严重的损害。

String.Source: I've killed a dragon. I think I can fix a stupid robot.
String.Dest: 我连龙都杀过。所以修理个机器人应该不成问题。

String.Source: This unit is afraid that your talent at slaying large hulking beasts has little influence on the ability to repair Constructs. At all.
String.Dest: 此单位认为你屠杀巨兽的天分恐怕并不会增强你修复装置的能力。分毫。

String.Source: How are you feeling now?
String.Dest: 你现在觉得如何?

String.Source: I am alive! ALIVE! Thank you, water puppet - you have restored sanity to this decrepit old body by reviving me!
String.Dest: 我还活着！活着！感谢你，水人偶-你拯救了我，让这副破旧的躯体恢复了理智！

String.Source: Are you comfortable in that shell of yours?
String.Dest: 你在机壳里感觉还好吗？

String.Source: This unit is functioning at only 40% efficiency. Programming is cluttered with unnecessary subroutines.
String.Dest: 此单位的运转效率只有40%。程序部分充斥着毫无必要的代码。

String.Source: Are you comfortable in that shell of yours?
String.Dest: 你在机壳里感觉还好吗？

String.Source: Master could repair damaged circuits, though this unit is not confident that sufficient knowledge on this unit's workings is available.
String.Dest: 主人可以尝试修复受损的回路，但此单位认为有关此单位工作原理的知识可能早已失传。

String.Source: Are you comfortable in that shell of yours?
String.Dest: 你在机壳里感觉还好吗？

String.Source: This unit may display irregular behaviour if improperly repaired. It is left to the Master's discretion.
String.Dest: 若修复出现问题，此单位可能出现行为异常。主人可自行决断。

String.Source: You can speak?
String.Dest: 你能说话？

String.Source: Asking unnecessary questions does not reflect well on your intellectual capacity, Master. Please refrain from doing so.
String.Dest: 提出不必要的问题无法很好的展示你的智力水平，主人。请您尽量节制这种行为。

String.Source: You can speak?
String.Dest: 你能说话？

String.Source: In general, it is best not to assume one's conversation partner is as mentally stunted as oneself.
String.Dest: 一般来说，说话者最好不要假设他的交谈对象如他自己一样智力发育迟滞。

String.Source: [Sabotage the Personality Matrix] (Smithing)
String.Dest: [破坏人格系统]（锻造）

String.Source: Master does not seem to know what he is doing - what is the purpose of rerouting my personality subroutines?
String.Dest: 主人似乎不知道他在干什么。重新设计我的人格程序的目的是什么呢？

String.Source: [Sabotage the Personality Matrix] (Smithing)
String.Dest: [破坏人格系统]（锻造）

String.Source: Master, do not tinker with that gyro, it could - [Fizzing Noise]
String.Dest: 主人，不要乱动那个陀螺仪，它会——【嘶嘶的杂音】

String.Source: [Sabotage the Personality Matrix] (Smithing)
String.Dest: [破坏人格系统]（锻造）

String.Source: It worked! Remarkable work, for an organic. I hadn't expected it from a bloodbag such as yourself, to be quite frank.
String.Dest: 奏效了！对一个有机体而言，你干的很漂亮。坦白讲，我从来没想到像你这样的血包能做得这么好。

String.Source: Never mind, not right now.
String.Dest: 算了，现在不要。

String.Source: This unit understands - please return quickly with sufficient expertise, or not at all. Salutations!
String.Dest: 此单位收到-请尽快携带足够的专业知识回来，或者什么都不带。此致！

String.Source: I once escaped a dragon and the executioner's block. At the same time.
String.Dest: 我曾经一次逃脱了两场大难。巨龙的袭击和刽子手的行刑台。

String.Source: Although your skill at fleeing like a little girl may be impressive, I'm afraid that it has little impact on the ability to repair Constructs.
String.Dest: 虽然你小姑娘样的逃跑技巧令人印象深刻，但我恐怕它对修复构架没有帮助。

String.Source: [Cross some wires at random, see what happens.]
String.Dest: [随意对换几根线，看看会发生什么。]

String.Source: Master, that circuit doesn't go there! Ocular sensors malfunctioning! Left leg high throughput detected.
String.Dest: 主人，这个回路不该连到那里！视觉传感器机能异常！左腿被检测到吞吐量过高。

String.Source: [Cross some wires at random, see what happens.]
String.Dest: [随意对换几根线，看看会发生什么。]

String.Source: Unit shutting down.
String.Dest: 单位关闭中。

String.Source: Brace yourself. I'm going to attempt a repair.
String.Dest: 打起精神来。我打算试着修复一下。

String.Source: One with sufficient knowledge in Dwemer smithcraft may have the expertise to fix the problems this unit is experiencing.
String.Dest: 一个拥有足够矮人锻工知识的人也许有能够解决此单位问题的专业技能。

String.Source: Brace yourself. I'm going to attempt a repair.
String.Dest: 打起精神来。我打算试着修复一下。

String.Source: Of course, one could always try to cross a few wires and see what happens.
String.Dest: 不过当然，谁都能试着对换两根线缆然后看看会发生什么。

String.Source: Brace yourself. I'm going to attempt a repair.
String.Dest: 打起精神来。我打算试着修复一下。

String.Source: One with sufficient knowledge in Dwemer smithcraft may have the expertise to fix the problems this unit is experiencing.
String.Dest: 一个拥有足够矮人锻工知识的人也许有能够解决此单位问题的专业技能。

String.Source: Brace yourself. I'm going to attempt a repair.
String.Dest: 打起精神来。我打算试着修复一下。

String.Source: Of course, one could always try to cross a few wires and see what happens.
String.Dest: 不过当然，谁都能试着对换两根线缆然后看看会发生什么。

String.Source: What kind of personality did I manage to activate anyway?
String.Dest: 不管怎么说，我激活了你哪一种人格？

String.Source: Merely a basic assassination personality, I assure you. There might be some elements of homicidal maniac as well. Can you tell?
String.Dest: 我向你保证，这只是个基本的刺客型人格。里头可能还有些虐杀狂倾向。谁知道呢？

String.Source: What kind of personality did I manage to activate anyway?
String.Dest: 不管怎么说，我激活了你哪一种人格？

String.Source: Assassination is my primary skill. I also possess excellent hearing and can bend spoons. Also, I really like to bludgeon people.
String.Dest: 刺杀是我的主要技能。此外，我有极佳的听觉，还能掰弯勺子。而且，我真的很喜欢威胁别人。

String.Source: Anything interesting, Relic?
String.Dest: 莱瑞克，有什么有趣的事情吗？

String.Source: Bloodsack! I don't know what you did, but I feel fantastic! HAH, if you weren't an organic pile of squishy organs, I'd hug you!
String.Dest: 血包！我不知道你做了什么，但我感觉一级棒！哈，如果你不是一堆黏黏糊糊的有机器官的话，我都想狠狠抱你一下！

String.Source: Anything interesting, Relic?
String.Dest: 莱瑞克，有什么有趣的事情吗？

String.Source: It feels great to be back among the fully functional! These razor-sharp claws haven't tasted blood in decades!
String.Dest: 能够功能齐全地归来的感觉真是太棒了！这些刀锋般锋利的爪子已经好几十年没尝过血的滋味啦！

String.Source: Anything interesting, Relic?
String.Dest: 莱瑞克，有什么有趣的事情吗？

String.Source: I won't hurt you, of course. Still, it's demeaning to even be near an organic protein shake - well, if you aren't one yourself.
String.Dest: 当然，我不会加害于你。但是和一包蛋白质混合物走在一块可真是有失身份——嗯，前提是你自己不是这类东西的话。

String.Source: Anything interesting, Relic?
String.Dest: 莱瑞克，有什么有趣的事情吗？

String.Source: I am not racist, you understand - I merely observe that organic life is inferior to my own. Simple observation.
String.Dest: 我不是种族主义者，你得明白——我只是观测到有机生命都比我要低贱。单纯是观测所得。

String.Source: Anything interesting, Relic?
String.Dest: 莱瑞克，有什么有趣的事情吗？

String.Source: How do you handle it, bag of meat parts? You have all these squishy parts, Master. And all that water.
String.Dest: 你是怎么做到的，大肉块堆？你全身有这么多黏糊糊的肉块，主人。还有那么多水分。

String.Source: Anything interesting, Relic?
String.Dest: 莱瑞克，有什么有趣的事情吗？

String.Source: How the constant sloshing doesn't drive you completely mad, I have no idea. Hey - perhaps you ARE mad! That would explain a few things...
String.Dest: 这样持续不断的剧烈晃动怎么才能不把你完全逼疯呢，我不知道。嘿，也许你就是疯了！这就能解释好些事了……

String.Source: Anything interesting, Relic?
String.Dest: 莱瑞克，有什么有趣的事情吗？

String.Source: Some of my cousins refer to your kind as Meatbags. I reject the classification : after all, there is much more water in you.
String.Dest: 我的一些堂兄弟把你这种家伙当成肉堆，我不认同这个分类：毕竟你身体里水分比较多。

String.Source: Anything interesting, Relic?
String.Dest: 莱瑞克，有什么有趣的事情吗？

String.Source: I prefer to be accurate when it comes to the contents of organic bodies - I have much experience in seeing those contents, after all.
String.Dest: 在描述有机体组成的时候我喜欢尽量精确——毕竟我亲眼看见那些成分老多次了。

String.Source: Anything interesting, Relic?
String.Dest: 莱瑞克，有什么有趣的事情吗？

String.Source: There is a 98% chance that I have been the victim of a most malicious practice employed by a blood puppet like yourself.
String.Dest: 有98%的概率是我成了你这样的肉偶雇来的充满恶意的雇工的牺牲品。

String.Source: Anything interesting, Relic?
String.Dest: 莱瑞克，有什么有趣的事情吗？

String.Source: I have determined that stains on the inside of my casing are consistent with the chemical compounds found in urine from the Khajit species.
String.Dest: 我已经确定，我机壳内部的污渍与虎人尿液中的化学成分一致。

String.Source: Anything interesting, Relic?
String.Dest: 莱瑞克，有什么有趣的事情吗？

String.Source: You wouldn't know who is responsible, would you?
String.Dest: 你不知道是谁的责任，对吧？

String.Source: Anything interesting, Relic?
String.Dest: 莱瑞克，有什么有趣的事情吗？

String.Source: There is a 98% chance that I have been the victim of a most malicious practice employed by a meat puppet like yourself.
String.Dest: 有98%的概率是我成了你这样的肉偶雇来的充满恶意的雇工的牺牲品。

String.Source: Anything interesting, Relic?
String.Dest: 莱瑞克，有什么有趣的事情吗？

String.Source: I have determined that stains on the inside of my casing are consistent with the chemical compounds found in urine from the Khajit species.
String.Dest: 我已经确定，我机壳内部的污渍与虎人尿液中的化学成分一致。

String.Source: Anything interesting, Relic?
String.Dest: 莱瑞克，有什么有趣的事情吗？

String.Source: I would suspect you, but my analysis discounts the possibility. A pity, you would have made a good target.
String.Dest: 我是怀疑你，但我的分析降低了这一可能性。真可惜，你本是一个很不错的怀疑对象的。

String.Source: Anything interesting, Relic?
String.Dest: 莱瑞克，有什么有趣的事情吗？

String.Source: Nothing to report, bloodbag.
String.Dest: 没什么可报告的，血袋儿。

String.Source: A functional Dwemer Centurion? Fascinating!
String.Dest: 一架正常运转的矮人机械？太神奇了！

String.Source: You seem to have arcane knowledge, blood puppet. Though pitiful in comparison to this unit's, it appreciates the gesture.
String.Dest: 看来你拥有一些秘法知识，肉人偶。虽然尚无法和此单位相提并论，但此单位仍对你表示赞赏。

String.Source: A functional Dwemer Centurion? Fascinating!
String.Dest: 一架正常运转的矮人机械？太神奇了！

String.Source: It has been centuries since anyone of decent intellect has struck up conversation with this unit, if it is completely honest.
String.Dest: 此单位说实话，距离此单位上次与智能生物对话已经过了数百年。

String.Source: A functional Dwemer Centurion? Fascinating!
String.Dest: 一架正常运转的矮人机械？太神奇了！

String.Source: Unfortunately, this unit does not foresee that changing in the foreseeable future.
String.Dest: 不幸的是，此单位没能预见到本可预见的未来。

String.Source: I fashion swords out of strips and iron. You're just 8 swords stuck to a barrel.
String.Dest: 我能用皮条和铁打出剑来。你不过就是八把剑插在一个桶上。

String.Source: Swords... are rather simpler than my kind, this unit argues. Forgive it for saying so, but you are making it very nervous.
String.Dest: 此单位认为，剑的构造……比我们简单得多。此单位请求您见谅，但您真的让此单位很不安。

String.Source: I could rearrange your circuitry to get rid of the focus on violence.
String.Dest: 我可以重连你的线路以修复你的暴力倾向。

String.Source: Why would you want to do that, organic? You are a person after my own heart - mess with things first, think later.
String.Dest: 为什么你想这么做，有机生物？你就是个无所顾忌家伙——先搞砸事情，再动脑子思考。

String.Source: I could rearrange your circuitry to get rid of the focus on violence.
String.Dest: 我可以重连你的线路以修复你的暴力倾向。

String.Source: I might even admit you are brutal, for blood and meat. In your place, I would have likely played around with the entrails of my victims.
String.Dest: 我甚至会承认你很暴力，对于血肉生物而言。如果我是你，我这就是在玩弄我受害者的内脏。

String.Source: I could rearrange your circuitry to get rid of the focus on violence.
String.Dest: 我可以重连你的线路以修复你的暴力倾向。

String.Source: There is something delightfully amusing about those - like giant worms, all juicy and disgusting. I love it!
String.Dest: 让人轻松愉快的东西总是很多——比如黏黏糊糊肥美多汁的大虫子。我就爱这个！

String.Source: Do you know if there is any link between the Dwemer and Propylon Chambers?
String.Dest: 你知道锻莫和石柱传送阵有什么关系吗？

String.Source: Databanks corrupted. Memory retrieval malfunction. Archive not found.
String.Dest: 数据库已损坏。记忆检索发生故障。档案不存在。

String.Source: Do you know if there is any link between the Dwemer and Propylon Chambers?
String.Dest: 你知道锻莫和石柱传送阵有什么关系吗？

String.Source: Databanks corrupted. Memory retrieval malfunction. Archive not found.
String.Dest: 数据库已损坏。记忆检索发生故障。档案不存在。

String.Source: Do you know if there is any link between the Dwemer and Propylon Chambers?
String.Dest: 你知道锻莫和石柱传送阵有什么关系吗？

String.Source: Databanks corrupted. Memory retrieval malfunction. Archive not found.
String.Dest: 数据库已损坏。记忆检索发生故障。档案不存在。

String.Source: What did the Dwemer believe in?
String.Dest: 锻莫有什么信仰？

String.Source: The Dwemer were a largely secular people, preferring reason over faith - this got them into numerous conflicts over the years.
String.Dest: 锻莫是很现实的种族，比起信仰他们更钟情于理性——这把他们卷入了长期的冲突。

String.Source: What did the Dwemer believe in?
String.Dest: 锻莫有什么信仰？

String.Source: Notably, they clashed with the Chimer, staunch followers of Daedra. The Dwemer mocked their foolish rituals and slaughter followed.
String.Dest: 值得注意的是，他们和变精灵——魔神忠实的追随者产生了一些冲突。锻莫嘲笑了他们愚蠢的仪式和仪式带来的屠杀。

String.Source: What did the Dwemer believe in?
String.Dest: 锻莫有什么信仰？

String.Source: It is interesting to note that it is not known whether the Dwemer had anything that could be called 'Religion' or if it was merely a metaphor.
String.Dest: 有趣的是我们不知道在锻莫文化里是否有能被称之为“宗教”的东西，或者“宗教”在锻莫而言只有隐喻意味。

String.Source: What did the Dwemer believe in?
String.Dest: 锻莫有什么信仰？

String.Source: The question of Dwemer religion is considered one of the greatest puzzles of the culture; I cannot add any insight.
String.Dest: 锻莫宗教信仰的问题是锻莫文化中最大的谜团之一；在这方面我无法加以评述。

String.Source: The construct, much like himself, did not enjoy its limitations. It took the gem for itself, using it to power its own systems instead.
String.Dest: 那装置，很像它的主人，不喜欢被限制。它擅自把灵魂石留作自用，用它来给自己的系统供能。

String.Source: Thus we learn, well, nothing really. As you might have guessed this Spider Centurion was me. I prefer to see my former slave master suffer.
String.Dest: 于是我们能学到……嗯，什么都学不到。你可能已经猜到了我就是这只蜘蛛百夫长。我就是喜欢看从前奴役我的主人受苦。

String.Source: I enjoy to the desperate screams and the begging echoing from within his prison. Invigorating!
String.Dest: 我喜欢回荡在他在囚牢里的绝望的叫声和和惨烈的乞求。真爽！

String.Source: How did the Dwemer react?
String.Dest: 那锻莫人作何回应？

String.Source: The Dwemer response was as inspired as it was gruesome : Internal trap mechanisms in each Construct unit. Iron Maidens, in some respects.
String.Dest: 矮人族的回应既天才又可怕：在每个结构单元里内置陷阱。某种意义上来说，就是铁处女。

String.Source: How did the Dwemer react?
String.Dest: 那锻莫人作何回应？

String.Source: The remnants of these systems, which would squeeze Chimer to jelly, are now commonly used as armour by inconsiderate and uninformed people.
String.Dest: 这些陷阱装置的残骸，本用来把变精灵压成肉酱的部分，现在被那些欠考虑又无知的人当成盔甲穿在身上。

String.Source: How did the Dwemer react?
String.Dest: 那锻莫人作何回应？

String.Source: It is a most delightful thought that almost every piece of 'Dwarven Armour' has been used to butcher Mer. It is a delicious irony.
String.Dest: 一想到每件“矮人盔甲”其实都是用来虐杀精灵的，我就特别想笑。这真是天大的讽刺。

String.Source: How did the Dwemer react?
String.Dest: 那锻莫人作何回应？

String.Source: I am most pleased to note that several parts in my internal systems have been used to decapitate people.
String.Dest: 更让我高兴的是，在我的内部系统中就有几个用来斩首的装置。

String.Source: Why do you call the Chimer savages?
String.Dest: 你为啥称呼变精灵为野蛮人？

String.Source: The Chimer were dirty Daedra-worshipping heathens after my own heart - if I had one, of course - though they didn't have much in the way of hygiene.
String.Dest: 我真心觉得——假如我有颗心的话——变精灵是肮脏的魔神崇拜者，虽然他们压根不懂什么叫卫生。

String.Source: Why do you call the Chimer savages?
String.Dest: 你为啥称呼变精灵为野蛮人？

String.Source: The Dwemer, my creators, chose to develop Steam Centurions, mighty among the Constructs and most effective at squishing people to paste.
String.Dest: 我的创造者，锻模人，决定开发蒸汽百夫长，最厉害，最有效率的杀人机器！

String.Source: Why do you call the Chimer savages?
String.Dest: 你为啥称呼变精灵为野蛮人？

String.Source: In response, the Chimer used an intriguing tactic : attack the constructs from within. This sabotage was most effective.
String.Dest: 对此，北地精灵有一个有趣的策略：从内部进行攻击。这种破坏是最为有效的。

String.Source: Tell me a story about Dwemer, Relic.
String.Dest: 给我讲讲锻莫的事吧，莱瑞克。

String.Source: Oh really, bloodbag? You have a stomach, do you not? Most people with such organs do not like my stories.
String.Dest: 哦你是认真的么，血袋？你也有胃的对吧？大部分人听了我这个故事之后胃都会不舒服。

String.Source: Tell me a story about Dwemer, Relic.
String.Dest: 给我讲讲锻莫的事吧，莱瑞克。

String.Source: In the days of the Chimer Exodus, the inhabitants of Dwemereth came in conflict with the invaders, the filthy savages.
String.Dest: 在变精灵远行记所述的那段时间里，锻莫瑞斯被卷入了一场侵略战争，一场由肮脏的野蛮人挑起的战争。

String.Source: Tell me a story about Dwemer, Relic.
String.Dest: 给我讲讲锻莫的事吧，莱瑞克。

String.Source: There was a great Dwemer Bard, long ago, enchanted by mechanical life in the form of the Sphere Centurion.
String.Dest: 很久以前，这里有个伟大的锻莫诗人，被百夫长球体傀儡的生命形式迷住了。

String.Source: Tell me a story about Dwemer, Relic.
String.Dest: 给我讲讲锻莫的事吧，莱瑞克。

String.Source: He chose to take on this form : a most enlightened pursuit. In an effort to achieve his goal, he gathered to him the rarest of soulgems.
String.Dest: 他选择把自己变成这种生命形式：一个极其智慧的选择。为了达到他的目标，他开始收集最为稀有的灵魂石。

String.Source: Tell me a story about Dwemer, Relic.
String.Dest: 给我讲讲锻莫的事吧，莱瑞克。

String.Source: He retrieved one of the greatest, and used it to stab himself in the chest : he was successful in trapping his soul within the object's many facets.
String.Dest: 他找到了一块最大的，然后把它插进了他自己的胸口：他成功地把自己的灵魂囚禁在了那块灵魂石的晶面之间。

String.Source: Tell me a story about Dwemer, Relic.
String.Dest: 给我讲讲锻莫的事吧，莱瑞克。

String.Source: A Spider Centurion was programmed to take the gem to a ready-made Sphere Centurion's body - unfortunately, the bard had not paid attention.
String.Dest: 他编好程序让一个蜘蛛百夫长把灵魂石送到一个已经做好的矮人球百夫长里去——不幸的是，那位诗人有点粗心。

String.Source: Tell me a story about Dwemer, Relic.
String.Dest: 给我讲讲锻莫的事吧，莱瑞克。

String.Source: Negative, water sack. Instead, let me recount the ways in which I would like to study the races of this world : organics fascinate me!
String.Dest: 拒绝，水包。此外，让我复述一下我研究这世界上生物的方式：有机器官让我着迷！

String.Source: Tell me a story about Dwemer, Relic.
String.Dest: 给我讲讲锻莫的事吧，莱瑞克。

String.Source: Mind you, I particularly like contemplating their internal organs: for example, is it true that Bosmer are green on the inside? Let's find out!
String.Dest: 听清楚，我特别喜欢研究有机体的内脏器官：你比如，木精灵的脏器真的是绿色的吗？让我们剖开看看吧！

String.Source: Tell me a story about Dwemer, Relic.
String.Dest: 给我讲讲锻莫的事吧，莱瑞克。

String.Source: Similarly, I believe Argonians might make for excellent boots, if you can get the juicy stuff out of those shiny skin-suits of theirs.
String.Dest: 同样的，我相信如果你能从亚龙人身上扒一块不错的皮下来，也许他们也能做出不错的靴子。

String.Source: Tell me a story about Dwemer, Relic.
String.Dest: 给我讲讲锻莫的事吧，莱瑞克。

String.Source: Khajiit, of course, are best in this regard - they're blood and meat packed in a neat furry package, with a handy tail to pin them up with.
String.Dest: 虎人，当然是再好不过了。他们的血肉都被装在干净而毛茸茸的皮囊里，还有一条方便的尾巴能把他们钉起来。

String.Source: Tell me a story about Dwemer, Relic.
String.Dest: 给我讲讲锻莫的事吧，莱瑞克。

String.Source: Bloodbag, do you think we could slaughter some innocents? I very much would like to try my pincers at it again, it has been a long time...
String.Dest: 血袋儿，你认为我们可以杀一些无辜的人吗？我很想再试试我的钳子夹在人身上的感觉，我已经很长时间没有……

String.Source: Tell me a story about Dwemer, Relic.
String.Dest: 给我讲讲锻莫的事吧，莱瑞克。

String.Source: Not right now... Perhaps later, blood puppet.
String.Dest: 不是现在……也许是以后吧，血人偶。

String.Source: What happened to the Dwemer?
String.Dest: 锻莫出什么事？

String.Source: The Dwemer lived in elaborate underground cities with deep tunnels across large parts of Tamriel, but particularly in Morrowind.
String.Dest: 锻莫住在精巧的地下城市里，他们挖出的隧道穿过泰姆瑞尔的绝大部分，但主要在晨风。

String.Source: What happened to the Dwemer?
String.Dest: 锻莫出什么事？

String.Source: They disappeared quite suddenly in the War of the First Council, after Lord Kagrenac, master Architect of the Dwemer made a mistake.
String.Dest: 他们在第一议会之战时期，由于锻莫的密法大师，卡格瑞纳克大人犯下的一个错误，突然间全部消失了。

String.Source: What happened to the Dwemer?
String.Dest: 锻莫出什么事？

String.Source: It is thought that his manipulation of the Heart of Lorkhan led to the sudden disappearance of the Dwemer, leaving Animunculi like myself behind.
String.Dest: 有人推想是因为他对洛克汗之心所做的事导致了矮人族的突然消失，只留下了我这样的蒸汽机械。

String.Source: What can you tell me about the Dwemer history?
String.Dest: 关于锻莫的历史你有什么能告诉我的吗？

String.Source: My databanks are partially corrupted, so my knowledge of history is spotty, at best. Still, I am willing to recount what I can.
String.Dest: 我的数据库一部分损坏了，因此我对历史的了解充其量就是个破碎的状态。然而我愿意提供我所能提供的东西。

String.Source: What can you tell me about the Dwemer history?
String.Dest: 关于锻莫的历史你有什么能告诉我的吗？

String.Source: The Dwemer are an extinct race of Mer hailing from Dwemereth, the region more commonly known now as Morrowind.
String.Dest: 锻莫是一种已灭绝的精灵，发源于锻莫瑞斯，现在通常被称为晨风省。

String.Source: What can you tell me about the Dwemer history?
String.Dest: 关于锻莫的历史你有什么能告诉我的吗？

String.Source: 'Dwemer' translates to 'deep' or 'secretive' people. 'Dwarves' is also occasionally used, though their stature was no different from other races.
String.Dest: '锻莫'应该翻译成“深处的居者”或“鬼鬼祟祟之人”。有时也用“矮人”这个词，虽然他们的身高和其他种族没什么不同。

String.Source: How hard can it be? I once made a Fortify Health Potion out of Giant's Toes.
String.Dest: 能有多难？我还用过巨人的脚趾做了瓶强化治疗药水呢。

String.Source: Giant's Toes? But... there is no nutritional value in such appendages whatsoever! This unit believes that Master is confused.
String.Dest: 巨人脚趾？但是……这种生物附肢毫无营养价值！此单位认为主人一定是弄错了。

String.Source: You've gotten rather murderous. I like it.
String.Dest: 你是越来越穷凶极恶啦。我喜欢！

String.Source: Murder, Killing, Maiming - you name it. I am programmed to do it - even if I didn't enjoy it, I'd have to do it.
String.Dest: 谋害，杀戮，致残 - 你指明目标，我替你去做 - 甚至如果我并不想去做，我也不得不去做。

String.Source: You've gotten rather murderous. I like it.
String.Dest: 你是越来越穷凶极恶啦。我喜欢！

String.Source: Thankfully, I enjoy it very, very much.
String.Dest: 感激不敬，我非常非常非常的喜欢它。

String.Source: Did no Dwemer survive?
String.Dest: 有锻莫幸存吗？

String.Source: A single dwarf remained alive until about two centuries ago, though it is unknown whether or not he remains so today.
String.Dest: 一个矮人从两个世纪前孤身一人存活，尽管现在是不是活着还是个未知数。

String.Source: Did no Dwemer survive?
String.Dest: 有锻莫幸存吗？

String.Source: He was infected with the Corprus disease and was thus effectively immortal, though the disease severely deformed his physical shell.
String.Dest: 他被感染了尸化病，并从而不朽，但是疾病严重将他身体扭曲硬化。

String.Source: Did no Dwemer survive?
String.Dest: 有锻莫幸存吗？

String.Source: Perhaps one day I will speak with him on lost days.
String.Dest: 也许有一天我能和他谈谈那些过去的日子。

String.Source: Anything interesting to report, Relic?
String.Dest: 莱瑞克，有什么有趣的事情回报吗？

String.Source: I am doing well, Master. I've been busy cleaning up my memory banks that are full of unwanted clutter and nonsense.
String.Dest: 我现在很好，主人。我正在清理我的内存空间，里头塞满了无用的杂物和垃圾。

String.Source: Anything interesting to report, Relic?
String.Dest: 莱瑞克，有什么有趣的事情回报吗？

String.Source: I came across an extensive report on Dwemer drainage pipes, believe it or not - I never knew that my original creators had such interests!
String.Dest: 我找到了一份关于矮人排水管道的延伸报告，信不信由你 — 我以前从来不知道我最初的创造者还有这种兴趣！

String.Source: Anything interesting to report, Relic?
String.Dest: 莱瑞克，有什么有趣的事情回报吗？

String.Source: There is also a large collection of unremarkable schematics for mobile battle armours - who would want that?
String.Dest: 也有不少平凡无奇的战斗用机动装甲的设计图-谁会要那种东西？

String.Source: Anything interesting to report, Relic?
String.Dest: 莱瑞克，有什么有趣的事情回报吗？

String.Source: I have been cleansing some of my internal circuitry that were clogged with, if you can believe it, personality files!
String.Dest: 我刚刚正在整理我紊乱的内部回路，信不信由你，我的人格文档！

String.Source: Anything interesting to report, Relic?
String.Dest: 莱瑞克，有什么有趣的事情回报吗？

String.Source: I had never expected to find so many hundreds of different personalities in my databanks, especially given that most are insane.
String.Dest: 我从没想过能在我的数据库里找到成千上万的不同的人格，尤其没想到还有这么是疯狂的人格。

String.Source: Anything interesting to report, Relic?
String.Dest: 莱瑞克，有什么有趣的事情回报吗？

String.Source: I am glad that you repaired me properly, Master. There's no telling what would've happened otherwise...
String.Dest: 我很高兴你修好了我，主人。我不想说否则会发生什么……

String.Source: Anything interesting to report, Relic?
String.Dest: 莱瑞克，有什么有趣的事情回报吗？

String.Source: I recall insulting you several times before you repaired me - I think it might have been contamination from a faulty circuit.
String.Dest: 我记得在你修好我之前我欺辱了你多次，我想也许是故障电路受到了污染。

String.Source: Anything interesting to report, Relic?
String.Dest: 莱瑞克，有什么有趣的事情回报吗？

String.Source: It seems that some personality files may be locked out from access - including particularly vicious ones.
String.Dest: 看起来有些私人文件锁在档案库里-包括一些特别邪恶的东西。

String.Source: Anything interesting to report, Relic?
String.Dest: 莱瑞克，有什么有趣的事情回报吗？

String.Source: If I ever show unusual behaviour, please do not hesitate to check my circuitry, Master.
String.Dest: 如果我表现出某些不寻常的行为，请不要犹豫的检查我的电路吧，主人。

String.Source: Anything interesting to report, Relic?
String.Dest: 莱瑞克，有什么有趣的事情回报吗？

String.Source: All is well, Master! So, how goes the adventuring? Slain any great beasts lately?
String.Dest: 一切都很好，主人！所以，您的冒险怎么样了？又杀了些巨兽了吗？

String.Source: Anything interesting to report, Relic?
String.Dest: 莱瑞克，有什么有趣的事情回报吗？

String.Source: Nothing to report, Master.
String.Dest: 没有新的报告，主人。

String.Source: What... are you?
String.Dest: 你……是？

String.Source: This unit is a Type-4 Automated Spider Centurion, at your service, Master.
String.Dest: 本单位为类型四自动化蜘蛛百夫长，为您服务，主人。

String.Source: It is not necessary to display your inferior vertical movements, I know how limited your fleshy form is.
String.Dest: 别这样上上下下地做无用功了。我很清楚你那副躯体有多无能。

String.Source: What are you doing?
String.Dest: 你在做什么？

String.Source: A corpse! Can I examine its insides? Please?
String.Dest: 一具尸体！我能检查一下它的体内结构吗？求求你？

String.Source: Fighting! Slaughter! Maim! Kill!
String.Dest: 战斗！屠宰！残害！杀戮！

String.Source: Oh dear!
String.Dest: 噢，亲爱的！

String.Source: Watch it, you might damage my circuitry!
String.Dest: 小心，别弄坏了我的线路！

String.Source: The Thu'um? It seems we are both relics of a bygone age!
String.Dest: 龙吼？看来我们都是旧时代的遗物啊！

String.Source: It was good to see you, Master.
String.Dest: 很高兴见到你，主人。

String.Source: See you later, bloodclot!
String.Dest: 回头见，血块儿！

String.Source: It is a satisfactory day, don't you agree?
String.Dest: 真是令人满意的一天，不是吗？

String.Source: Well met, bloodsack.
String.Dest: 很高兴遇见你，血袋。
